document.full_text: activist investor carl icahn cut his stake in video game publisher take-two interactive software inc, sending its shares down as the move dampened hopes for a quick company takeover.
document.title: activist icahn cuts stake in take-two interactive
lines_and_colors: activist investor carl icahn cut his stake in video game publisher take-two interactive software inc, sending its shares down as the move dampened hopes for a quick company takeover.
